# Request for Tender for Digital Workshop Lathe
#  Request for Tender [RFPT] No.: 23-58077Z

## Overview

The Government of Canada, through the National Research Council of Canada (NRC), is seeking a tender for the supply of a fully enclosed, digital workshop lathe for the machine shop operations at the Saguenay site. This initiative aims to modernize NRC facilities, improving the accuracy, size, and complexity of machined parts, as well as enhancing safety.

## Tender Details

*   **Reference Number**: CB-430-81080226
*   **Amendment Number**: 6
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-12-11
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-26 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-31
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

## Tender Status

This request for tender has expired.

## Scope of Work

The scope of work includes the supply of a fully enclosed, digital workshop lathe that meets the requirements of the NRC machine shop operations.

## Required Documents

To submit a tender, please obtain the tender documents related to this RFPT, including:

*   Tender Notice (English)
*   Non-Proprietary Pre-Qualification (NPP) form (English)
*   Request for Proposal (RFP) (English)

These documents are available at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or submission of tenders, please contact:

*   Name: Kacendra Dion
*   Email: Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca
*   Phone: 438-324-8125
